original_text: If any of God's people need anything, then help them with what you have. Always be happy to let people stay in your home.
korean_text: 성도들의 쓸 것을 공급하며 손 대접하기를 힘쓰라

sentences.original_text: If any of God's people need anything
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 하나님의 백성 중에 어떤 사람이 무언가 필요하다면

sentences.original_text: then help them with what you have
Always be happy to let people stay in your home
sentences.korean_translation: 항상 기쁜 마음으로 사람들을 당신의 집에 머물게 하세요
